channel.title: Haskell on Sean Chen's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Haskell on Sean Chen's Blog

item.title: Haskell::From(Rust) I: Infix Notation and Currying
item.description: Prelude I’ve been meaning to learn Haskell for a while now. Most people who write Rust likely have had at least a background-level exposure to Haskell (if they hadn’t already encountered/learned the language on their own prior). Since the language (along with ML and possibly OCaml?) had such an effect on Rust’s development, digging into it will likely pay dividends in the form of improving my understanding of Rust.
